trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref> event, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref>事件， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"> </xref>事件，或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartCancelEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> event, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: WebPartCancelEventHandler 委托中指定的方法调用时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>事件，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute, `OnWebPartClosing` attribute, or `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以通过添加为 Web 部件事件提供自定义处理程序`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`属性，`OnWebPartClosing`属性，或`OnWebPartDeleting`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以以编程方式分配自定义处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式将分配一个事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 如何︰ 连接事件处理程序方法与事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。
